headline: Henry Schein Received Validation of Net-Zero Science-Based Targets
summary: MELVILLE, N.Y., April 07, 2025--Henry Schein, Inc. (Nasdaq: HSIC), the world’s largest provider of health care solutions to office-based dental and medical practitioners, announced today that the Science Based Targets initiative (SBTi) has approved the Company’s near-term and long-term science-based emissions reduction targets and has verified Henry Schein’s net-zero science-based target by 2050.

raw.headline: Henry Schein Received Validation of Net-Zero Science-Based Targets

(Nasdaq: HSIC), the world’s largest provider of health care solutions to office-based dental and medical practitioners, announced today that the Science Based Targets initiative (SBTi) has approved the Company’s near-term and long-term science-based emissions reduction targets and has verified Henry Schein’s net-zero science-based target by 2050.
